column3: ACK 7ac9c1f, esp. with @jonatack's suggestions above (e.g. spelling and release notes).
thanks for reviews! updated to incorporate feedback

nit, maybe fix the other outstanding one too:

```bash
$ test/lint/lint-spelling.sh 
src/wallet/test/spend_tests.cpp:57: neccesary ==> necessary
test/functional/p2p_addr_relay.py:182: intialize ==> initialize
```

ideas, for better or worse
```diff
-- Nodes will no longer forward address gossip to inbound peers by default. The
-  peer will become eligible for address gossip upon sending an ADDR, ADDRV2, or
-  GETADDR message. (#21528)
+- By default, bitcoind no longer rumours addresses to inbound peers. They only
+  become eligible for address gossip after sending an ADDR, ADDRV2, or GETADDR
+
>         // SetupAddressRelay will never fail since this must be an outbound connection.\n\nit can only be an *inbound* connection ;)
